testcase.classname: validate if the user is able to add an item to the cart and Order Information would be displayed, re-confirm the product details, subtotal, tax and order total.
testcase.name: Validate if the user is able to add an item to the cart
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to the baskinrobbins website...........................passed When user click on order online in the webpage to select item...............passed And user enter valid store locator address..................................passed And user select order from list of stores...................................passed Then user navigate to list of availble products on the page.................passed When user click on cakes and pies from the list.............................passed
